display_long_description:
Crystal Conquest is a Free-To-Play VR game where you control the elements and battle for victory. Imagine the elemental magic of Avatar in VR across fighting, MOBA, and level based campaign modes!


**Key Features:**

- Play as elemental mages - 4 available by default, unlock more over time

- Choose which spells to take into battle, unlock more over time

- Customize your in-match shop - choose your potions, wands and other items, unlock more over time

- Different modes to suit your mood: Duel (1v1), Conquest MOBA (3v3) or Gauntlet (players vs waves of enemies)

- Single player or Multiplayer

- Private lobbies available, bring your friends

- Skills-based matchmaking to pair you with equal opponents

- Shape the game's future by communicating with the Studio on Discord


[media]



**Build your mage:** Choose the class that matches your playstyle and elements. Unlock class variants as you grow and customize your build.

[media]



**Harness the elements:** Battle with elemental magic where each element has unique properties. Use earth, fire, water, and wind to block, dodge, and deflect your enemy's attacks.

[media]



**Grow in Power:** Level up and unlock even more epic spells that change how you control the elements.

[media]



**Choose Your Battle Mode:** Battle in 3v3 matches to capture crystals and topple towers, face off in duels, or team up in co-op to take on waves of AI. All modes support AI for solo or practice play.

[media]
